title: Cinnamon and soft cheese rolls with a maple and whisky glaze
description: These soft, buttery rolls have a delicious spiced filling and a devilish boozy glaze that's perfect for Christmas.
ingredients: 625g/1lb 6oz strong white bread flour, plus extra for dusting
500g/1lb 2oz chilled butter, cut into 1cm/½in-thick slices, plus extra for greasing
1 vanilla pod, split in half lengthways, seeds scraped out using a sharp knife
2 egg yolks, lightly beaten, for egg wash
